nodes.text: Waypoint Station Aurek was a Galactic Republic military station built on Taris during the Cold War. It served as a secure base for soldiers and medical personnel during the reconstruction of Taris. Later, the reconstituted Sith Empire conquered the base and established the tower command station there.

Commander Viqui led Waypoint Station Aurek, commanding the various Republic scouts, riflemen and officers. Captain Childress was head of security for the base. Doctor Ianna Cel was also based at Aurek, along with her team of medical personnel, as well as Cera and Garthe.
